headline: RTX Corporation (RTX) Completes a Critical Review of Its New Advanced Electronic Warfare (ADVEW) Prototypes for the U.S. Navy’s F/A-18E/F Super Hornet
summary: With significant upside potential, RTX Corporation (NYSE:RTX) secures a spot on our list of the 10 Best Defense Contractor Stocks to Buy Now.
